HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Ekomi, ebotami mpe ekoki na Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Tozali kokitisa nzela ya makasi mpo na biloko ya makambo ya sika. Bato nyonso balekaki na client-side. Tozali na mayele te pona IP yo, yango okomaki, to ye oyekoli masolo na ba lien - mpe nsima, contenu.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Oyo nde ye moko akoyeba lien na makambo ya sika oyo okomaki mpe na ye oyo okotuna yango. Ntango okomaki makambo ya sika, okoki kotola motema pona ekozala liboso ekozala makasi. Lisusu, okoki kotola liboso ya ekolo. Ntango nyonso, makambo ekozala pamba na nsima ya mikolo 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Bato nyonso mpe contenu ezali hashé na client-side, yango esengeli te tozala na lien mpe contenu. Lien nyonso ezali na ID unique ya longueur ya 36 oyo ezali one-way encryption pona kokamata Secret Message mpe contenu oyo ebotami na AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Koma masolo na / to generate motema
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Ekomi, ebotami mpe ekoki na Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Koma masolo ya sika, motema to biloko ya makambo *

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Mbote, o received masolo ya sika!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Koma mpe kenda masolo, ekosala pamba soki esimbi.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Kokoma Stellar Secret na mobile, komaka masolo ya sika
